name: Fated To Die
description:
Fated to Die is a dark text based adventure game where the choices you make are determined by dice rolls.  The game features branching paths, choices that impact outcomes and multiple endings. 

Tutorial.

The fate die rolls in each scene to determine which choices are available.  You may click on more dice to attempt to roll to unlock more choices.  Each time you roll, the value is added to the fate counter.  If the fate counter fills, a single die is rolled and that roll's option is the only one you can choose.
